targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y %k:%i') as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y') as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  "WR: Sum (timerange)" as "type",
  sum(BatPowerLaden)/60000 AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatPowerEntladen)/60000 AS "Bat"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  "BYD: Sum (timerange)" as "type",
  max(Laden_kWh)-min(Laden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  max(EntLaden_kWh)-min(EntLaden_kWh) AS "Bat"
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  dcPowerPV AS "PV Power",
  BatPowerEntLaden AS "Bat Power",
  acPower AS WR,
  -BatPowerLaden AS "Bat Laden",
  EinspeisenPower AS Einspeisen
  /* (AktHomeConsumptionSolar+AktHomeConsumptionBat)/acPower AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil */
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
Order By time_sec

SELECT
  round(time_sec,-1) AS time_sec,
  PackVoltage_V as "BYD: Bat Spannung",
  if(Current_A>0,Current_A,0) as "BYD: Bat Strom Laden",
  if(Current_A<0,-Current_A,0) as "BYD: Bat Strom Entnahme"
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  round(time_sec,-1) AS time_sec,
  BatVoltage as "WR: Bat Spannung",
  if(BatCurrentDir = 0,BatCurrent,0) as "WR: Bat Strom Laden",
  if(BatCurrentDir = 1,BatCurrent,0) as "WR: Bat Strom Entnahme"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Entladen (WR)" AS metric,
  avg(BatPowerEntladen) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  "Entladen (BYD)" AS metric,
  (max(Entladen_kWh)-min(Entladen_kWh))*12000 as value
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "kWh Entladen" AS metric,
  sum(BatPowerEntladen)/60000 AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY to_days(timestamp),hour(timestamp)

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  "kWh Entladen (BYD)" AS metric,
  (max(Entladen_kWh)-min(Entladen_kWh)) as value
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY to_days(timestamp),hour(timestamp)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Laden" AS metric,
  avg(BatPowerLaden) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  "Laden (BYD)" AS metric,
  (max(Laden_kWh)-min(Laden_kWh))*12000 as value
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "kWh Laden" AS metric,
  sum(BatPowerLaden)/60000 AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY to_days(timestamp),hour(timestamp)

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  "kWh Laden (BYD)" AS metric,
  (max(Laden_kWh)-min(Laden_kWh)) as value
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY to_days(timestamp),hour(timestamp)

SELECT
  round(time_sec,-1) as time_sec,
  "Ladestand (WR)" AS metric,
  avg(BatStateOfCharge) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 300

SELECT
  round(time_sec,-1) as time_sec,
  "Ladestand (BYD)" AS metric,
  SOC
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  "PackVoltage_V" as "metrics",
  PackVoltage_V/7/16
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  MaxCellVol_V,
  MinCellVol_V,
  MaxVolPos,
  MinVolPos
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  time_sec AS "time",
  SysTemp_C,
  MaxCellTemp_C,
  MinCellTemp_C,
  MaxTempPos,
  MinTempPos
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time_sec,$__interval),
  max(Laden_kWh)-min(Laden_kWh) AS Laden_kWh,
  max(Entladen_kWh)-min(Entladen_kWh) AS Entladen_kWh,
  CycleCounts AS Counts
FROM BYD_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY CycleCounts

SELECT
  T1.time_sec as time_sec,
  avg(T1.value) as value,
  metrics
FROM
(SELECT
  time_sec+3*3600 AS "time_sec",
  avg(BatPowerEntLaden)*7*100/(max(BatStateOfCharge)-min(BatStateOfCharge)) as value,
  "Expected Capacity" as metrics,
  DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 3 HOUR) as TIMESTAMP
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec+3*3600) and HOUR(DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 3 HOUR))<8 and BatPowerLaden=0
Group by TO_DAYS(DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 3 HOUR)))T1
Where T1.value>2
Group by year(T1.TIMESTAMP),month(T1.TIMESTAMP)
